title: How to Buy Call Options Smarter: Step by Step Guide
description:
💡 Join the Outlier Pro Patreon Community for weekly livestreams, private community, market & trade analysis, direct Q&A, & more. https://www.patreon.com/OutlierTrading
► Free Guide for Beginner Options Traders. https://www.outliertrading.io/guide
► Subscribe to the Outlier Insights Newsletter. https://outliertrading.substack.com/
► Join the FREE Outlier Community Discord. https://discord.gg/hYGZUEJpve
► Listen to the Outlier Podcast. https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLAFDZ3YyC4rSe9h-s9XvtxktSm16-7-9L
► Learn About Erik. https://www.outliertrading.io GME Playlist. https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLAFDZ3YyC4rT6RC93CLnTAZ-qQUrxx8w7 



▬ AFFILIATES  ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
► 50% off Options Omega Backtesting: https://optionomega.com/register/esinvests
► 50% off ORATS Options Trading Platform, Backtesting, & More: https://orats.com/esinvests
► Barchart Premium - Try for FREE: https://www.barchart.com/get-barchart-premier?fpr=xaiek


Timestamps. 
00:00 - Introduction
00:45 - Core Concepts of Buying Options
    - Introduction to three key concepts: Days to Expiration (DTE), Delta, and Gamma
01:31 - Days to Expiration (DTE)
    - Explanation of how the length of time until expiration affects option price and behavior
    - Longer time frames mean more expensive options due to extrinsic value
    - Slower Gamma movement in out-of-the-money options with longer expiration
04:01 - Delta
    - Understanding Delta: Measures rate of change of an option’s premium per $1 move in the underlying asset
    - Higher Delta means more expensive options but better responsiveness to price changes
    - Delta and Gamma relationship and their impact on in-the-money and out-of-the-money options
06:01 - Gamma
    - Introduction to Gamma: Rate of change of Delta
    - Gamma is higher in at-the-money options and as expiration approaches
    - Impact of Gamma on potential profit from options with high Delta closer to expiration
09:31 - Practical Application and Platform Demonstration
    - Demonstration using GameStop options to illustrate discussed concepts
    - Practical examples of selecting options based on DTE, Delta, and Gamma
    - Examination of 60 Delta call options and their behavior over different expiration periods
12:00 - Advanced Considerations
    - Further exploration of strategic considerations in options trading
    - Benefits and trade-offs of higher Delta options
    - Scenarios demonstrating the impact of Delta and Gamma on option profitability
15:01 - Summary and Best Practices
    - Summary of key points to consider when buying options
    - Importance of balancing Delta, Gamma, and DTE
    - Practical tips for minimizing losses and optimizing trades
text: All of us traders are degenerates at heart, however, the goal of this video is to help some of my game stop people think about buying call options or really any option a little bit differently so that rather than putting on positions that magically vanish in a couple of days and all your money has gone, we might actually stand a chance at making some money out here because what we don't want is to be in the scenario of our friend and teak marketing who's down 99.68 with 32 left to go, super unfortunate. But who knows, they have some Apple options, expire in this week, they're pay off might be there. My guess is they're probably making a bunch of the mistakes I'm about to walk through with you guys. We're going to talk about kind of looking at options a little bit differently through the lens of these three things. Days, expiration, how long the contract lasts. The delta of the option, delta simply measures the rate of change of an options premium for every one dollar move in the underlying and then gamma which is simply the rate of change of delta. So I am not going to get super theoretical here. My goal is to keep this as practical as possible. So with that, let's get straight over into the platform and we're going to grab GameStop in dig right in. Okay. So the first thing to know is you notice the first thing
